On October 15, 2024, we will host an introduction event for all students who are interested in joining BEARS. The event will take place at 18:00 in room F11 (ground floor) in the [RFT building](https://maps.app.goo.gl/sixUKMx4wxruqQFr8).

Dare the limits and join us there!
